name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CoLi - Copy Linkedin Recruiter search result

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps in copying the search results made from LinkedIn Recruiter Lite

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you copy content from the search results, the color of the page will turn YELLOW 

GO TO LINKEDIN RECRUITER LITE 
make a search query
You will find a TAB called - "COPY" --> at the bottom
This is button you can copy item with the help of..
